roleset.name: get, obtain
roleset.note: EXACT-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from exact.01-v)
EXACTION-N NOTES: Based on verb entry exact.01. Corresponds to VerbNet entry 13.5.2. Framed by Claire. (from exaction.01-n)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: With each revision, the constitution became increasingly jumbled, while [NA delegates]-9 leveraged their positions *-9 to exact "constitutional amendment rent" and fatten themselves up.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: The many restrictions safeguard Pinglin's beautiful natural setting, but they exact a heavy toll from the local people.

example.name: Args 0, 2 within LVC
example.text: He was simply making extortionate exactions upon his wretched lessees .

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: This was because al-Andalus, before his arrival, was facing annihilation by the conquests of the Christians and their exaction of tribute from all its kings
